content:
2022年11月23日不只是小冷的生日，这一天还有你最可爱的偶像小冷的演唱会🤗
November 23 2022 is not only my birthday, but also the same day for your cutest idol Xiaoleng's concert🤗

我在日本东京Yoani Live Station的演唱会现场等你，请在日本时间18:30到达会场，一定要带紫色的荧光棒
I’ll see you at the concert venue at Yoani Live Station which located in Tokyo, Japan; please arrive the venue at 18:30 JST; remember to bring purple light sticks.

在YouTube还有哔哩哔哩还会有演唱会的同步直播，可以提前订阅以获取直播通知
We’re also scheduled to have the real-time livecast of this concert on my YouTube and Bilibili Channel; you may subscribe in advance to receive livecast notification.

我们2022年11月23日见😘
See you at my concert on November 23 2022😘
